name: py-bigdft

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
BigDFT: the python interface of BigDFT for electronic structure
calculation based on Daubechies wavelets.

dependencies.name: bigdft-futile
dependencies.description:
BigDFT-futile: a library handling most common FORTRAN low-level
operations, like memory managment, profiling routines, I/O operations.
It also supports yaml output and parsing for fortran programs. It also
provides wrappers routines to MPI and linear algebra operations. This
library is intensively used in BigDFT packages.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: bigdft-suite
dependent_to.description:
BigDFT-suite: the complete suite of BigDFT for electronic structure
calculation based on Daubechies wavelets.
